alert.note: Alert for McCreary (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 5:31PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern McCreary County through 600 PM EDT... At 531 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Co- Operative, or 8 miles southwest of Whitley City, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Blue Heron around 540 PM EDT. Stearns around 545 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Strunk and Pine Knot. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
